[[inst_lw_smax]]
==== LW.SMAX

*Syntax:* lw.smax<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Signed Max operation: memory value is atomically signed maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lw_smax.svg[LW.SMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
